content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The very best proactive cyber security strategy requires both technology that can identify potential attacks, and skilled cyber security analysts who are armed and ready to investigate and mitigate these threats.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1607334293544{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”]Falanx Cyber’s Managed Detection and Response (MDR) Service adopts a ‘Detection-in-Depth’ approach to re-engineer the traditional solutions of antivirus and firewall technologies to detect more than just yesterday’s threats.

Our unique approach reduces the Mean Time to Detect (MTTD) and Mean Time To Respond (MTTR) to cyber security incidents down to a couple of seconds. Significantly reducing the cost, time and effort in dealing with any cyber attack.

This is achieved by leveraging multiple protective and analytical capabilities to provide a multi-layered defensive security posture.

Watch our short animation to find out how detection in depth works:[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/485551827″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1607332748389{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”]The service combines capabilities such as:

  • Managed Security Information and Event Management (SIEM)
  • Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR)
  • Network Detection & Response
  • Machine Learning
  • File Integrity Monitoring (FIM)
  • External IP Monitoring
  • Deep, Dark and Surface Web Monitoring
  • Endpoint Security Configuration Reviews
  • Suspicious Email Analysis
  • Threat Intelligence

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1607332947483{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”]Our fully-managed service, delivered from our UK-based SOC, delivers the strongest protection to all sizes of organisations and reduces the skills gap by providing clients with a means to make use of our advanced capabilities like threat hunting, anomaly detection, and incident response, without having to be experts themselves, all at an affordable price point.

To find out more about how Falanx Cyber can help protect your business, contact our team today.

[/vc_column_text] Get in touch [/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
